subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: After a defeat to North Carolina on Sunday night, the Scarlet Knights will soon find out how they stack up against No. 3 Pittsburgh on Wednesday and No. 2 Connecticut on Saturday.
snippet: After a defeat to North Carolina on Sunday night, the Scarlet Knights will soon find out how they stack up against No. 3 Pittsburgh on Wednesday and No. 2 Connecticut on Saturday.
